players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Bob is suspicious, I think he's a detective."
Bob: "I will continue to investigate and gather more evidence. I suspect Alice might be the detective since she remained silent."
Diana: "I think Bob is the detective, he's trying to distract us from his own investigation."
You: "Let's all stay cautious and gather more information before making any accusations. Bob has been investigating, so let's support him in his efforts to uncover the truth."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
